items assigning to planner codes Assign Item to Planner Code
section.para: To assign an Item to a Planner Code, select the "Assign Item to Planner Code" option. The following screen will appear:
When assigning an Item to a Planner Code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item you want to assign to a Planner Code.
Select to assign the Item to a Planner Code for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse where you want to assign the Item to a Planner Code.
Specify the Planner Code you want to assign the Item to.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without assigning an Item to a Planner Code, returning you to the application desktop.
Assigns the specified Item to the specified Planner Code.
